website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch chainsaw that is perfect for clearing brush, trimming trees, or stockpiling firewood.
pros: Offers an automatic oiling system and oil level window for easy maintenance
Chain tension adjustment requires no tools
Includes a bar and chain cover and safety start button
Boasts rubber over-molded handles that provide a comfortable grip
cons: Blade sometimes runs off the track
Ideal for light and moderate jobs only

customer_reviews.title: Works as easy as pie!!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew that an electric chainsaw could work so well and so flawlessly? I had a gas chainsaw previously and I'll tell you that not having to worry about gas and yearly maintenance will be such a relief! This product was ready to go right out of the box! All you have to do is add the oil. Glad I also read the reviews on Amazon before I bought it too to make sure I was getting the correct chainsaw for my needs. This chainsaw works well, is very light-weight and I didn't have to worry about the electric extension cord ever getting in my way! A great product to have!
customer_reviews.author: AJ-Philly

customer_reviews.title: Chain will not stay on the bar
customer_reviews.text: The chain came off 3 times while in operation. Each time I replaced it I checked the chain,bar, lube,tightness of the chain to the bar.After running 20 seconds or 3 minutes it would jump off the for no reason that i could see.Went to the local hardware store and bought a spare chain, same problem. I am lucky to still have both hands at the speed the chain comes off the bar. I would like to buy one of better quality/safer then the Earthwise and pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Schmucker

customer_reviews.title: Chain does not stay on!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd use in the year I've had it. Am doing minor small jobs cut, limbs etc. Should went with the cheap portland one from Harbor freight, this thing is garbage. go with anything but this junk. Now I have to deal with warranty and find a place to fix it. I'm heading to harbor freight for another. I've been working with this chain and it isn't going to come together with a tight chain no matter what I do. The tightening thing is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Butch's widow

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great cutting down a dead peach tree in the back yard. Need to buy chain oil and add it before use since it doesn’t come with it. The only reason for 4 stars is because the package arrived mangled. The chainsaw blade was bent (see picture) because the box was mishandled during the amazon shipping process. Took it out to the garage and straightened the blade; worked good afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W.

customer_reviews.title: 65-year-old woman handles this chainsaw with ease. Cuts better than any other chainsaw I've used.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 65-year-old woman, and heat my home with a wood-burning stove (propane furnace backup). This chainsaw is light enough for me to handle, and cuts better than any gas or electric chainsaw I've ever used. I keep my 50-pound electric generator in the 4-wheeler wagon, so that I can drive thru the woods and cut firewood anywhere with my Earthwise 16" electric chainsaw, and quickly split wood with my diamond splitting wedge, sledge hammer, and splitting maul (looks like an axe).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: chain start getting off the bar
customer_reviews.text: the third time use, the chain start getting off from the bar. Put it on so many times, soon I start it the chain off from the saw can't even stay over 5 seconds. still under" Manufacturer’s warranty", I did contract them, wait the answer back now.
customer_reviews.author: Tian

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: First electric, awesome, no cord pulling. Could hear gas one somewhere in the neighbor hood. cuts are quick and smooth. I bought this as a amazon warehouse deal for 48.00 delivered. My wife didn't believe it and showed her my invoice. Came in great new condition. Cut wood up to eight inches with no problem. Easy tension control. Light and again QUIET.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: My First Chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have prior experience with chainsaws but I needed one to take down a dying tree in my front yard. This was easy to assemble and operate and took the tree down easily. I also cut the trunk into many smaller pieces so now I have firewood for my fire pit. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kohl

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time yesterday, works very well. Only complaint is that it was shipped in the production box instead of inside another stronger box, this could have cause damage to the bar. Luckily ,no damage. Surprising strength and cut ability from an electric saw. Recommended .
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful for being just electric.
customer_reviews.text: Just because this is electric does not mean it is without power. It does the job quite well. I bought one of these to take down limbs from up in the tree. This was a replacement one for the same item I bought a few years back. Only reason I had to buy a new one is I dropped the old one out of the tree 30’ up onto he driveway. Housing shattered on the driveway. Not at all a product issue, as I would not expect anything to survive that. Liked it well enough, bought the same one again.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Pope

customer_reviews.title: Great Chainsaw!
customer_reviews.text: Using it to clear out some mature gum trees on my property, each are about 18-24" diameter. Chain has popped off a few times but that's more likely my fault than the machine's--should be adjusting the tension more often. It is corded which I thought could be annoying but really isn't bad. Good piece of equipment so far!
customer_reviews.author: casey dean cline

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up,chain adjustment works easily. We used a 100 foot extension cord and sawed/stacked a quarter cord of mixed wood in 15 minutes. We blew it out with the air compressor and done. I'll never use a gas saw again......
customer_reviews.author: India

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Threw my shoulder out, so I needed a saw that starts without a pull-rope. This saw does a great job, plenty of power. I'm not sure yet whether the chain oiling system is effective--it's using much less oil than I would expect, and the chain may be a bit dry. I'll have to keep watching that. The saw is solid feeling. So far, I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Irene

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use after reading the manual well. The weight it has is appropriate to make it easy to use. I used it for about 4 hours running and excellent. Tip: have an extension and oil.
customer_reviews.author: wari moll

customer_reviews.title: Great saw!
customer_reviews.text: Previously purchased 10 years ago, and it just stopped working. Great saw. Was happy to see it still available. Have other sturdy products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough saw
customer_reviews.text: Made it through some tough old Australian pine. Solid saw, quite. Oregon s57 chain for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: The chain keeps flying off after about 2 minutes of cutting. Also the bar and chain oil doesn’t seem to work. I am taking it to the dump.
customer_reviews.author: bigKmart

customer_reviews.title: 🌳 man
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he liked it ok .He said it was a little smaller than he liked but it did the job. It is only for small trees nothing big.
customer_reviews.author: granny 1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This works great for cutting small trees and can even be used on large tree trunks.
customer_reviews.author: Cody L. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Like better than my gas saw.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly lightweight saw compared to some gas ones that I have used. Does the job for cutting tree branches that have fallen in the wooded area of my property. Easy and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Gina W.

customer_reviews.title: This is actually heavier than I expected. I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: This is actually heavier than I expected. I purchased the electric one over the battery because of weight. But this is a serious tool for my small yard.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Harris

customer_reviews.title: I had a 40 foot tree die last year and I was looking for an easy solution which was electric
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't know what to expect. I have cleared a lot of trees over the years with gas saws. Now I live on a half acre with just a few trees. I had a 40 foot tree die last year and I was looking for an easy solution which was electric. This saw did everything I needed it to do. Not as powerful as a gas saw, but I'm not clearing land anymore. Just some trimming. I've only had this saw a short time and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: Great power, and super easy to use. I’ve used it on many 12” limbs with no problem. Obviously having to run a cord back to an AC source is limiting, but it’s fine on 150’ of extension cord, and it’s a lot easier than dealing with a gas chainsaw. I haven’t had any leakage issues in storage like mentioned in some other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice saw
customer_reviews.text: Butt kicking electric saw, nice for the money it does not have a break on the chain so be careful
customer_reviews.author: Conquistador

customer_reviews.title: Harder to use on ladder.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great, but s little heaver then my 14" saw. Harder to use on ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: I didn't expect this to work so well
customer_reviews.text: But I've cut up a couple trees now - it's worked well
customer_reviews.author: Margaret H.

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: falls apart, you need to assemble every other use. i will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: raul sandoval

customer_reviews.title: No a fan
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't happy with it, but they refunded my money promptly
customer_reviews.author: ray

customer_reviews.title: Chain is useless
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and buy a chain. The one that came with it can barley cut anything
customer_reviews.author: Luis Olmo

customer_reviews.title: Backwards chain dull chain
customer_reviews.text: Why would you send me a chainsaw with the chain on backwards now the chain is dull
customer_reviews.author: Fouad H.

customer_reviews.title: I used it to cut up a downed tree and was very happy. need to have something to keep the cord ...
customer_reviews.text: lots of power for it's size,I used it to cut up a downed tree and was very happy. need to have something to keep the cord attached though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... it through light duty and it has worked out great.
customer_reviews.text: I put it through light duty and it has worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: It has a cord. Pretty obvious.
customer_reviews.text: It did everything I hoped it would. I used it to cut down numerous dead trees and cut the trunks down.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Arrived, filled with oil and started to go to town on damaged trees and tree limbs after a recent snow storm. So far, works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Jason R Orlinick

customer_reviews.title: It is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: The Motor is very powerful, Quiet, dependable, and easy to use. Safer then gasoline chainsaw and is not as scary. No smells.
customer_reviews.author: James Hewett

customer_reviews.title: Great little chainsaw!
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to handle, easy to tighten the chain, and surprisingly strong and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lasley

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: great for the price. cut up fallen tree with trunk 1.5 to 2 feet in diameter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Earthwise CS33016 16-Inch 12-Amp Corded Electric Chainsaw, Green
product_meta.description: Style:16-Inch, 12-Amp GreenThe Earthwise Corded Electric Chainsaw is a high-performance chainsaw that is powerful, yet easy to use. It starts easily every time without a mess. This electric chainsaw has a 16" Oregon bar and chain with a tool-free chain adjustment for all your outdoor cutting needs. There is an automatic oiling system with an oil level window to keep your chainsaw lubricated at all times, so you get uninterrupted cutting action.
feature_bullets: Electric chainsaw with a 12-Amp motor that delivers power and performance comparable to gas chainsaws
16" Oregon bar and chainsaw chain for fast and clean cuts; The corded electric chainsaw includes protective bar blade cover for safe storage
Corded electric chainsaw with a convenient automatic oiling system and oil level window; Easy tensioner adjustment without the need for tools
Electric chainsaw with a comfortable rubber over-molded grip and big loop assist handle
Planet-friendly electrical saw that does not require fuel to function; Take out the hassle, fumes, and mess of fall clean-up around your home; 3-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars324 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
